subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets had only three hits against Chris Heston, who no-hit them last month, but Niese’s strong outing and Johnny Monell’s ninth-inning double helped the Mets win in San Francisco.
snippet: The Mets had only three hits against Chris Heston, who no-hit them last month, but Niese’s strong outing and Johnny Monell’s ninth-inning double helped the Mets win in San Francisco.
